message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.IT 

Reasoning: The paper deals with online optimization problems, which are often studied in the machine learning community. The use of the Mirror Descent algorithm and the INF strategy suggests a focus on optimization and learning algorithms, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of binary vectors and combinatorial optimization suggests a connection to algorithms and data structures, which falls under the category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The study of regret and the minimax regret suggests a connection to game theory, which falls under the category of cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory). The use of the exponentially weighted average forecaster suggests a connection to prediction and forecasting, which falls under the category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the study of feedback models suggests a connection to information theory, which falls under the category of cs.IT (Information Theory).
